title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 28 cm [11"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 64 cm [25"]  Selvedge one side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 12 cm [4 3/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 64 cm [25"] Selvedge one side, cut other side.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. rust color ground with 2 shades of gold color
b. rust color ground with off-white and lighter rust/orange
